Ines Michelis &
Marit Rühe

Tria

Tria is a modular wall system where the floor plan can be freely decided and changeable fabric rolls. The system is easy to assemble and dismantle. It consists of three main parts, which can be stowed away in a small space. Tria is a system with as few limits as possible, allowing for creativity in building rooms and fully immersing your exhibition, even when showcasing multiple objects.

@ines.michelis
m.ruehe@udk-berlin.de
i.michelis@udk-berlin.de

About

How do you convey the essence of an object? When viewing an object in an exhibition, unable to use it or see it in its correct context, how do we fully understand it? What about the opposite moment, when we only experience it through other media but don’t encounter the object itself?

Presenting, and representing, your designs is a constant part of a designer’s life. This term we looked at how you present work IRL, and how you represent it digitally.
